author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief of Army Staff, General Dalbir Singh, paying respects to the mortal remains of ex-chief Gen. O.P. Malhotra, in New Delhi on Thursday.- Phtoto: PTI

Former Army chief General O.P. Malhotra (93), who passed away on December 29, was laid to rest with full military honours at Brar Square in Delhi Cantonment on Thursday.

General Malhotra died due to old age complications at his residence in Gurgaon.

General Dalbir Singh, the Chief of Army Staff, laid a floral wreath to pay tribute to General Malhotra, the Army said in a statement.

Gen. Malhotra was the 13th Chief of Army Staff from 1978 to 1981.

He is survived by his wife Saroj and two children.
title: Former Army chief O.P. Malhotra laid to rest
